subject: New IME Referral – Johnathan Doe – Case #NF-39281
body:
Good morning,

We are referring a new Independent Medical Examination for the following claimant:

Patient: Johnathan Doe
Claim / Case Number: NF-39281
Exam Type: Orthopedic IME
Requested Exam Date: March 18, 2025
Location: Los Angeles, CA

Please find the declaration and medical records attached.
Let us know if this date works or if alternate availability is required.

Thank you,
Melissa Grant
Law Firm ABC

attachments.text_content: Declaration of Melissa Grant regarding Johnathan Doe. I declare under penalty of perjury that I am a partner at Law Firm ABC and have personal knowledge of the facts stated herein. On January 15, 2024, Mr. Johnathan Doe was involved in a workplace incident that resulted in significant orthopedic injuries. I witnessed the aftermath and have reviewed all relevant documentation related to this case.

Medical records for Johnathan Doe including prior treatment notes. Patient presented to emergency room on 01/15/2024 with acute lower back pain and right shoulder injuries sustained during workplace accident. Initial examination revealed decreased range of motion in shoulder, tenderness in lumbar region. X-rays showed no fractures. MRI ordered for further evaluation. Patient referred to orthopedic specialist. Follow-up visits on 01/22/2024, 02/05/2024, and 02/19/2024 documented ongoing pain and limited mobility.
